title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Your goal is to align high-minded principles with practice today, but circumstances and people may try your patience. Perhaps you are extra nice to someone, only to see them repay you with criticism and rudeness. Of course, theres no need to return their impoliteness with your own, nor is it advisable to isolate yourself from the group. Instead, simply acknowledge that youre still learning how to be your best and highest self. Some people must learn their manners before they can interact with you on equal footing. Respect is earned, not given. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
